00277 inline bool CLine2d::operator == (const CLine2d& line) const
00278 {
00279        return ((m_point1 == line.m_point1) && (m_point2 == line.m_point2));
00280 }
00281 
00282 
00283 inline bool CLine2d::operator != (const CLine2d& line) const
00284 {
00285        return !operator == (line);
00286 }

00288 
00289 inline bool CLine2d::IsNull() const
00290 {
00291        return (m_point1 == m_point2);
00292 }

00295 inline CVector2d CLine2d::GetDiffVector() const
00296 {
00297        return m_point2 - m_point1;
00298 }

00325 inline double CLine2d::GetCutXPos(double linePosY) const
00326 {
00327        CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
00328 
00329        return (linePosY - m_point1.GetY()) * diff.GetX() / diff.GetY() + m_point1.GetX();
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 
00334 inline double CLine2d::GetCutYPos(double linePosX) const
00335 {
00336        CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
00337 
00338        return (linePosX - m_point1.GetX()) * diff.GetY() / diff.GetX() + m_point1.GetY();
00339 }
00340 
00341 
00342 inline double CLine2d::GetCutAlpha(const CLine2d& line) const
00343 {
00344        const i2d::CVector2d& delta = GetDiffVector();
00345        const i2d::CVector2d& lineDelta = line.GetDiffVector();
00346        const i2d::CVector2d& beginPoint = GetPoint1();
00347        const i2d::CVector2d& lineBeginPoint = line.GetPoint1();
00348 
00349        double crossProductZ = lineDelta.GetCrossProductZ(delta);
00350 
00351        return (beginPoint.GetCrossProductZ(delta) + delta.GetCrossProductZ(lineBeginPoint)) / crossProductZ;
00352 }
00353 
00354 
00355 inline double CLine2d::GetCastAlpha(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
00356 {
00357        i2d::CVector2d delta = GetDiffVector();
00358        i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
00359 
00360        double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
00361        return dotProduct / delta.GetLength2();
00362 }
00363 
00364 
00365 inline QPair<double, double> CLine2d::GetAlphaAndCastDistance(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
00366 {
00367        i2d::CVector2d delta = m_point2 - m_point1;
00368        i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
00369 
00370        double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
00371        double field = delta.GetCrossProductZ(deltaToPoint);
00372        double deltaLength2 = delta.GetLength2();
00373 
00374        return QPair<double, double>(dotProduct / deltaLength2, field / ::sqrt(deltaLength2));
00375 }
